title: Routine Cleanings & Exams
description: A cleaning of your teeth followed by a thorough check for cavities and gum disease

title: Teeth Whitening
description: An effective way of lightening the natural color of your teeth without removing any of the tooth surface

title: White Fillings
description: Restoration of the function and integrity of missing tooth structure resulting from decay or trauma

title: Crowns, Bridges & Veneers
description: Restoration of lost or severely damaged teeth to improve appearance and function

title: Full and Partial Dentures
description: A removable replacement for missing teeth and surrounding tissues

title: Implants
description: Restoration of tooth roots to provide for a strong foundation for permanent or removable teeth

title: Veneers
description: Custom-made shells that are placed on the front of the teeth to improve their appearance

title: Sealants
description: Thin coatings that when painted on the chewing surfaces of the teeth that can prevent cavities

title: Bonding
description: Using white filling material in a thin layer over your teeth to fix cosmetic concerns

title: Scaling & Root Planning
description: Sometimes referred to as a "deep cleaning," this procedure is the first line treatment for periodontal "gum" disease

title: Esthetic Recontouring
description: Reshaping procedure for chipped or slightly irregularly shaped teeth

title: Root Canals
description: A procedure used to remove infected material and relieve pain in the inner parts of the tooth

title: Clear Aligners
description: The clear alternative to metal braces

title: Extractions
description: The removal of teeth to eliminate pain and/or infection

title: Oral Sleep Apnea Devices
description: Upper and lower retainers that position the lower jaw forward to open the airway

title: Occlusal "Night" Guards
description: Clear retainer for reducing premature tooth wear and pain reduction in the jaw
